title: FontLab
content: does anyone know where i can get a free coopy of FontLab?
author: unitprodesign

comments.content:
If you are concerned with cost, you might consider TypeTool, FontLab's little sister.   
   
 [http://www.fontlab.com/Font-tools/TypeTool/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417102715/http:/www.fontlab.com/Font-tools/TypeTool/)
